T02D2206:177a-1: mantr'a lam k'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D2206:177a-3: sngags kyi rgyan gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D2206:177a-4: bcom ldan 'das thugs kyi rang bzhin phyag na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2206:177a-5: sngags rnams bdag po dpal ldan rdo rje can /
T02D2206:177a-6: sku gsum rang bzhin yon tan kun gyi mdzod //
T02D2206:177a-7: nyon mongs gdung ba rtsad nas zhi mdzad cing //
T02D2206:177a-8: dus gsum sangs rgyas rang bzhin gos sngon can //
T02D2206:177a-9: gsang ba'i bdag la dang bas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2206:177a-10: myur du grub par 'ong par yi //
T02D2206:177a-11: de nyid sngags ni bshad par bya //
T02D2206:177a-12: gang zhi rnal 'byor pa yis ni //
T02D2206:177a-13: sngags la gtso cher byed pa yis //
T02D2206:177a-14: rigs bzang don dang ldan pa yis //
T02D2206:177a-15: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2206:177a-16: sngags kyi mi mthun kun spangs nas //
T02D2206:177a-17: snyan pa'i gnas su legs 'dug ste //
T02D2206:177a-18: sems sbyang lhag pa'i lhar gyur te //
T02D2206:177a-19: bsrung dang tshogs bsag stong par bsgom //
T02D2206:177a-20: de nas rang gi sems nyid ni //
T02D2206:177a-21: yi ge h'um gi rnam pa las //
T02D2206:177a-22: bh'um 'phros gzhal yas khad par gyur //
T02D2206:177a-23: de steng h'um las cho ga gsum //
T02D2206:177a-24: de las dpa' ldan gtum pa'i gzugs //
T02D2206:177a-25: g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02D2206:177a-26: g-yon pas bya khyud nges par bsnams //
T02D2206:177a-27: sku mdog sngon po dpa' ba'i chas //
T02D2206:177a-28: g-yon brkyang g-yas bskum gdug pas brgyan //
T02D2206:177a-29: ye shes bstim dang byin brlabs nas /
T02D2206:177a-30: dbang bskur 'bras bu lnga dang ldan //
T02D2206:177b-0: de rjes sngags @177b kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D2206:177b-1: bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam pa yis //
T02D2206:177b-2: rags pa dang ni phra ba yi //
T02D2206:177b-3: shin tu phra ba'i rnam pa ste //
T02D2206:177b-4: sems dpa' sum brtsegs gzhal yas khang //
T02D2206:177b-5: gsal bar byed pa de nyid de //
T02D2206:177b-6: rnal 'byor tshul gyis yongs su bsgrub //
T02D2206:177b-7: 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang //
T02D2206:177b-8: gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog dang //
T02D2206:177b-9: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dang //
T02D2206:177b-10: sngags kyi dus su spang par bya //
T02D2206:177b-11: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro //
T02D2206:177b-12: de bzhin rig bya la sogs dang //
T02D2206:177b-13: g-yeng bar gyur pa ma lus pa //
T02D2206:177b-14: sngags kyi dus su spang bar bya //
T02D2206:177b-15: sgra che ba dang sgra chung dang //
T02D2206:177b-16: skyen pa dang ni bul ba dang //
T02D2206:177b-17: mi gsal yang lag nyams pa dang //
T02D2206:177b-18: gsang sngags par du sgra zhugs dang //
T02D2206:177b-19: dmigs pa ma rdzogs 'jog pa dang //
T02D2206:177b-20: sngags kyi dus su spang bar bya //
T02D2206:177b-21: rjes kyi rnal 'byor ma lus par //
T02D2206:177b-22: dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma dang //
T02D2206:177b-23: ro dang dbang bskur la sogs pa //
T02D2206:177b-24: sems dpa' sum brtsegs gsal ba yis //
T02D2206:177b-25: rang nyid thig le'i ngo bo yi //
T02D2206:177b-27: 'od dkar zhi ba'i tshul du bzlas //
T02D2206:177b-29: rang bzhin tshur 'dus gdug rtsub sbyong //
T02D2206:177b-30: yad na dmigs pa med pa las //
T02D2206:177b-33: rnam smin la sogs bsreg cing sbyong //
T02D2206:177b-35: mtshan ma 'dod pa rnams pa lnga //
T02D2206:177b-36: gong du bsnyen pa'i don du gsangs //
T02D2206:177b-37: sum 'bum bdun dang bcu gnyis so //
T02D2206:177b-38: 'di yang grangs kyi tshad du gzugs //
T02D2206:177b-39: de yi grogs 'gyur bzlas pa ni //
T02D2206:177b-40: sdig pa dbyung dang sreg pa dang //
T02D2206:177b-41: bkru ba'i don la dmigs pa ste //
T02D2206:177b-42: rang dang phra ba'i dbang dag tu //
T02D2206:177b-43: drug dang dgu ru shes par bya //
T02D2206:177b-44: sdig pa dbyung pa la sogs kyang //
T02D2206:177b-45: mi drug gzugs dang de bzhin du //
T02D2206:177b-46: yig gzugs dang ni 'od kyi gzugs //
T02D2206:177b-47: de dag dbyung gtor bsreg cing bkru //
T02D2206:177b-48: dmigs pa gsar rnying bye brag gis //
T02D2206:177b-49: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma'o //
T02D2206:177b-50: sngags kyi dngos grub 'dod dus su //
T02D2206:177b-51: cho ga dang gtor ma s'atstsha dang //
T02D2206:177b-52: klog 'don dge ba skyong la sogs //
T02D2206:178a-2: bsnyen [?] sgrub chen po la sogs pas //
T02D2206:178a-3: yongs su bsgrub pas dngos grub 'byung //
T02D2206:178a-4: sku gsum ngo bo'i tshul la ni //
T02D2206:178a-5: 'od sgra sku dang 'gul dang ldeg / khol dang gang dmigs de dbang 'gyur //
T02D2206:178a-6: 'di yang sgrub nga'i rtags su gsungs//
T02D2206:178a-7: gos sngos lus la gnas pa dang //
T02D2206:178a-8: dung 'bud pa dang chos rnams ston //
T02D2206:178a-9: stong gsum ma lus mthong ba dang //
T02D2206:178a-10: dbang bskur khrag sogs lus las 'thon //
T02D2206:178a-11: me tog sngon po nyi zla shar //
T02D2206:178a-12: rmi lam dag tu byung ba na //
T02D2206:178a-13: 'di yang grub pa'i rtags su gsungs //
T02D2206:178a-14: de dag bzlas pa'i sngags gsungs pa //
T02D2206:178a-15: aom na mo n'i l'a mba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um phat /
T02D2206:178a-16: aom r'a dza ma h'a ga ru da h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2206:178a-17: bzlas lugs man dag shes par bya'o //
T02D2206:178a-18: mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2206:178a-19: sku gsud thugs kyi rnam pa la //
T02D2206:178a-21: bsnyen pa skyol bas de bzhin bya //
T02D2206:178a-22: rna ba dang ni dbang po gzhan //
T02D2206:178a-23: gong ma de bzhin sbyor shes bya'o //
T02D2206:178a-24: gang zhig phrin las rnam bzhi las //
T02D2206:178a-25: dang po zhi ba gsungs pa ni //
T02D2206:178a-27: rang gi sdig dang bag chags kang //
T02D2206:178a-28: gzhan gyi gdug rtsub zhi bar byed //
T02D2206:178a-29: tshe ring rigs rgyud longs spyod rnams //
T02D2206:178a-31: bde gshegs 'od bskul rang lus kyi //
T02D2206:178a-32: rang bzhin tshe rnams rgyas par byed //
T02D2206:178a-34: 'jig rten rigs rgyud rgyas par byed //
T02D2206:178a-35: nor dang rdzas ni rgyas 'dod pas //
T02D2206:178a-36: rin chen bcud kyi tshul du bsgrub //
T02D2206:178a-37: kha dog dmar po sbyar ba yis //
T02D2206:178a-38: dmigs pa ma lus dbang du sdud //
T02D2206:178a-39: tshar gcad dus kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02D2206:178a-41: dgug cing tho ba la sogs pas //
T02D2206:178a-42: drag po'i mtshon chag thog phab pas //
T02D2206:178a-43: spyi bo gtsug gnas rnams su ni //
T02D2206:178a-44: phung po gzhig pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02D2206:178a-47: de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rnams //
T02D2206:178a-48: mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya //
T02D2206:178a-49: de rnams sngags kyi mtha' la ni //
T02D2206:178a-50: nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las //
T02D2206:178a-51: thar bar gyur cig h'um phat sv'ah'a //
T02D2206:178b-0: zhes pa sgrub pa'i snying por @178b gsungs //
T02D2206:178b-1: 'di ni kun gyi man ngag go //
T02D2206:178b-2: mkhas pa tshig la mi ltos par //
T02D2206:178b-3: gzu lums la gzhal gang zag gis //
T02D2206:178b-4: bskal par bsgrubs kyang 'bras bu med //
T02D2206:178b-5: de bas mkhas pa rab tu gces //
T02D2206:178b-6: 'di brtsams pa yi dge ba yis //
T02D2206:178b-7: rigs dang phra ba'i rtog pa dang //
T02D2206:178b-8: nad kyi zug rngu zhi ba dang //
T02D2206:178b-9: sngags kyis nyon mongs kun spangs nas //
